title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Odell Beckham Jr signing with the Rams and why Sean McVay has become the NFL's best salesman. He discovers the one issue some of the NFL's best head coaches are dealing with that has fans now doubting their greatness. He also shares his Blazing 5 NFL picks for week 10. Plus, 2-time Super Bowl Champion LeSean McCoy joins the show to tell Colin why OBJ will help lift the Rams offense to the next level. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
